title: blog: 1.7 release article links to mobile Wikipedia article on SSA
body:
Unsure if this belongs here, but just to let you know:

The 1.7 release article in the blog (https://blog.golang.org/go1.7) links SSA to the mobile version of Wikipedia (https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Static_single_assignment_form) instead of the Desktop version. This is a little weird on a Desktop.

I'm using Opera beta 39.0.2256.37 on Linux, if that makes any difference.

Thanks for the great work! Keep it up :)
